articles.title: Best Budget Smartphones Under ₹15000 in 2025
articles.excerpt: Discover the top budget smartphones offering flagship features at affordable prices. Complete comparison with specifications, camera quality, and performance analysis.
articles.content:
Top Budget Smartphones That Don't Compromise on Quality

Finding a great smartphone under ₹15,000 has become easier with manufacturers focusing on budget segments. Here are our top picks that offer exceptional value for money.

1. Realme Narzo 60 5G

The Realme Narzo 60 5G stands out with its MediaTek Dimensity 6020 processor and impressive 64MP camera setup. The phone offers smooth performance for daily tasks and decent gaming capabilities.

Key Specifications:

  • 6.43-inch AMOLED display with 90Hz refresh rate
  • MediaTek Dimensity 6020 chipset
  • 64MP + 2MP dual camera setup
  • 5000mAh battery with 33W fast charging
  • 8GB RAM + 128GB storage

2. Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Pro

Xiaomi continues to dominate the budget segment with the Redmi Note 12 Pro, offering premium features at an affordable price point.

"The best budget phone is one that doesn't feel like a compromise. These smartphones prove that you don't need to spend a fortune for a great mobile experience."

Performance Comparison

All phones in this list have been tested for:

  1. Daily performance and multitasking
  2. Camera quality in various lighting conditions
  3. Battery life with heavy usage
  4. Gaming performance with popular mobile games
  5. Build quality and durability

Final Recommendations

Based on our extensive testing, here are our recommendations for different user types:

  • Best Overall: Realme Narzo 60 5G
  • Best Camera: Redmi Note 12 Pro
  • Best Battery: Samsung Galaxy M34 5G
  • Best Performance: POCO X5 5G
